entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Churchill Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Falls 05:42 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -12.2°C
Wind: E 41 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
